title: Options
description: Configuration options for the language server.

language_retrieval_patterns.description: A list of patterns to aid the LSP in finding a language, given a file path. Patterns must have one capture group which represents the language name. Ordered from highest to lowest precedence.

parser_install_directories.description:
A list of strings representing directories to search for parsers, of the form `<lang>.(so|dll|dylib)` or `tree-sitter-<lang>.wasm`.

Supports environment variable expansion of the form `${VAR}`.

valid_captures.description: A map from query file name to valid captures. Valid captures are represented as a map from capture name (sans `@`) to a short (markdown format) description. Note that captures prefixed with an underscore are always permissible.

valid_directives.description: A map of directive names (sans `#` and `!`) to parameter specifications.

valid_predicates.description: A map of predicate names (sans `#` and `?`) to parameter specifications.

Predicate.description: A type specification for a predicate (or directive).

description.description: A short description of the predicate (in Markdown format).

parameters.description: The list of valid parameter types.

PredicateParameter.description:
A parameter type reference.

Parameters can be one or both of two types (a capture or a string), and can be required, optional, or "variadic" (there can be zero-to-many of them).

arity.description: The arity of the predicate parameter. Must be `"required"`, `"optional"`, or `"variadic"`.

description.description: An optional description of this parameter.

type.description: The type of this parameter. Can be `capture`, `string`, or `any` (either a capture or a string).

PredicateParameterArity.description: The arity of the predicate parameter.

oneOf.description: A parameter which can be omitted. Must only be followed by other optional parameters.
A parameter which can appear zero-to-many times. Must be the last parameter if present.

PredicateParameterType.description: The type of the predicate parameter.

oneOf.description: Can be either a capture or a string.
